Mix and Mash: the great NZ remix and mashup competition is proudly announcing the competition winners today online. A huge congratulations from CC Aotearoa to Jem Yoshioka, recipient of the Creative Commons Award for the Supreme Remix!

There are some fabulous reuses of Creative Commons datasets and content to explore, we're looking forward to hearing more about the work of all the entrants. See live updates about the remix and mashup category winners from Mix and Mash on Twitter.

Take me to the Mix and Mash winners.
